usageInstructions: Fill in all required variables before generating the blog post
Keep meta title under 60 characters for optimal SEO
Meta description should be 150-160 characters for best search results
Use descriptive alt text for all images to improve accessibility and SEO
Target keyword density should be 1-3% for natural content flow
Include 2-3 internal links and 1-2 external authoritative sources
Optimize content length for your audience (typically 1000-2500 words)
Plan social media promotion across multiple platforms
Set up analytics tracking before publishing to measure performance
Use the content checklist to ensure quality and completeness
